bookinfo.title: COMP_hack: The Definitive Guide
bookinfo.subtitle: Shin Megami Tensei Online: IMAGINE Server Emulator

abstract.para: Documentation for the development and use of COMP_hack. COMP_hack is a server emulator developed for the game Shin Megami Tensei Online: IMAGINE.
